note:
Social media account of the Mat-Su Monitor, student paper of Mat-Su College in Palmer, Alaska. MSC is part of the University of Alaska system.

We post news and satire about campus life and events.

We follow back!

Disclaimers: This account does not reflect the opinions of anyone outside the Mat-Su Monitor. In fact, it barely reflects the opinions of those inside the Mat-Su Monitor! We don't speak for MSC or UA.

ANYTHING we do on here =/= endorsement
